hard: Celeste – denies Astaroth resurrect healing with “White Night” skill. Astaroth will resurrect himself or an ally with 1 health
Morrigan – denies Astaroth resurrect completely. Resurrected hero will be turned into a skeleton
soft: Armor penetration – Astaroth has a lot of armor. Having heroes who have a lot of armor penetration will help to soften Astaroth
